Summary: saw an object go over my house, white, red and yellow flashing lights.
divs: Sighting Detailslooking out of window, looked up and above tree level and object moving to my right. bright white, changed colors to gold, and red. moving very fast. We had noticed on several nights that there were strange lights in our areas. they would move, and dissappear.
